title: Match history is broken?
body: None of my match history is loading and even 3rd party websites can't load them using Riot's API

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have these matches appeared yet?
Hope they do fix it, quite an annoying bug lol
None of my matches are showing after early afternoon on the 2nd of this month. Have to use op.gg to keep track of my games.

Hey man, I'm experiencing something similar. None of my recent matches are recorded. Everything after August 02 4:20PM isn't shown on the in-client page or even on Riot's official match history website.
